title: Trash new client
body:
It seems every second champion select - my client freezes, black screens, automatically closes or doesn't update the bans as they happens.  Since the patch i've had wait queues for games.  has anyone got similar problems and have a possible solution? 
I never had any of these problems on the old client..

replies.body: Damn that sounds quite bad actually, have you checked "Enable Low Spec Mode" in the client settings?

Yeah I've tried that already mate. 
Low spec mode & reinstall already done.
My computer specs are perfectly fine too.. this is a joke

No worries, we'll get some Wrenchmen on it :D Hopefully they can give you a hand. While they show up though, see if you can try to "Initiate Full Repair". For some people on here it's been working better than uninstalling.
